name: MISHAP
short_description: MISHAP is the open-source MMM in silico simulated spin label to HADDOCK program. MISHAP aims to take spin labelled proteins and the distance distributions between labels from in silico (MMM) calculations or experimental data (from pulsed electron-electron double resonance experiments which have been analysed with DeerAnalysis) and pass them to the biomolecular docking program HADDOCK as docking restraints.
